parameters.definition: Number of nodes in the network
Number of arcs in the network
Set of arcs represented as pairs of nodes
Capacities of each arc in the network

output.definition: Elementary flow through each arc in the network
Total flow from source node to sink node

description: The Maximum Flow Problem in a network is to maximize the flow from a given source node to a given sink node subject to conservation of flow constraints at each node and flow capacities on each edge/arc. The objective is to find the maximum total flow through the network from the ource into the sink.
